title: Confirm Trade Settlement
description: A back-office analyst ensures that a physical cargo trade is settled correctly, meaning the payment is made and the title is transferred.

tasks.description: Retrieve the details of the completed trade, including the final volume, price, and counterparty.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final deal ticket is retrieved from the trade capture system.

tasks.description: Generate an invoice and send it to the counterparty.
tasks.expected_outcome: A correct invoice is created and sent.

tasks.description: Verify that the payment has been received and then issue a confirmation of title transfer to the buyer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The payment is confirmed, title transfer is complete, and the trade is marked as 'Settled'.
